data.title: Raymond Felton remains the villian in Portland, crowd boos throughout the night

data.text:
Mavericks 115, Trail Blazer 112 (OT)

Click here to view the box score.

Advertisement

Some notes from the Mavericks' Tuesday night matchup vs. Portland:

Advertisement

-- The Mavericks stayed over in Portland after Tuesday's game and will use Wednesday as a travel/rest day

Mavericks

Be the smartest Mavericks fan. Get the latest news.

Or with:

Google

Facebook

By signing up you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

-- Former Maverick Al-Farouq Aminu has been starting for the Blazers. He played minimal time against the Mavericks in the first half

-- Raymond Felton, who started in place of Parsons, remains a villain in Portland. The crowd, still remembering his 60-game run with the Blazers in 2011-12 when he had a subpar season and the team struggled, booed him every time he touched the ball.
